entry.title: Welcome
entry.summary: Welcome to my personal site! By arriving here, we’ve already started to forge a meaningful connection. This isn’t just a page of credentials or projects; it’s a window into my journey as a technologist and problem solver. Whether you’re exploring my portfolio, curious about my ideas, or searching for someone to help transform data into insights, your visit signifies shared purpose. Let’s continue the conversation and create something impactful!
entry.content:
Welcome to my personal site! By arriving here, we’ve already started to forge a meaningful connection. This isn’t just a page of credentials or projects; it’s a window into my journey as a technologist and problem solver. Whether you’re exploring my portfolio, curious about my ideas, or searching for someone to help transform data into insights, your visit signifies shared purpose. Let’s continue the conversation and create something impactful!

In meantime, check my library...

entry.title: BigQuery Book
entry.summary: I like what Google done, bring compute to data not data to compute.
entry.content: I like what Google done, bring compute to data not data to compute.

entry.title: Spark Book
entry.summary: I read the book twice, once with a focus on the Python examples and once on the Scala examples. I particularly enjoyed the Scala implementation. It's a powerful language, though unfortunately, it doesn't seem to have the same widespread adoption as Python.
entry.content: I read the book twice, once with a focus on the Python examples and once on the Scala examples. I particularly enjoyed the Scala implementation. It's a powerful language, though unfortunately, it doesn't seem to have the same widespread adoption as Python.

entry.title: ML Book
entry.summary: A textbook for my University of Toronto class on Machine Learning and Deep Learning. A classic.
entry.content: A textbook for my University of Toronto class on Machine Learning and Deep Learning. A classic.

entry.title: NLP Book
entry.summary: Before LLM models, getting good sentiment analysis model was not easy, but possible.
entry.content: Before LLM models, getting good sentiment analysis model was not easy, but possible.

entry.title: Pandas Book
entry.summary: Some clients of mine, converted SAS to Python Pandas, until they hit memory issues. Don't take me wrong Pandas are great. They are a gateway drug to Python data processing.
entry.content: Some clients of mine, converted SAS to Python Pandas, until they hit memory issues. Don't take me wrong Pandas are great. They are a gateway drug to Python data processing.
